Summary: bright object that was moving across the sky
trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Baton Rouge
There were no other sightings in Baton Rouge on or around March 24th 2007
divs: Sighting Detailswe were watching the sky through our telescope when we decided to take a break and just look around.we looked at the south eastern part of the sky and then we saw it. a bright object was moving ass the sky. at first we thought it was a star until it moved. it moved in zigzag formation. we just stared at it. we did not move. then it just disappeared. after we saw it we screamed.
